entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
